title: Add App Referral to verification queue
text: Please confirm that you want to add a referral to the verification queue for the App: <appName/> Using your Advocate Id: <advocateId/> Please note that the verificacion process may take a bit. Always check that your link works (log in and open it, and verify that the 'Get Discount' button is there) before adding it.

error.invalid-advocate-id: The Advocate Id is invalid, please review it
error.pasted-invalid-advocate-id: The pasted Advocate Id is invalid, please review it; only an Advocate Id or a single referral url can be pasted here
error.pasted-too-many-urls: The text pasted includes too many urls; only an Advocate Id or a single referral url can be pasted here
error.pasted-invalid-urls: The text pasted includes an invalid url; only an Advocate Id or a single referral url can be pasted here

toast.openAndCopyToClipboard: Your Referral link was copied to the Clipboard
